Unknown.translation: For immoral acts, there is no end for a whore to do up her ornamentation and embellishment. But without a husband, whose wife would she be called as?

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: vysvwˆ dy ivBcwr vwsqy kIqy gey isMgwrwˆ dw qwˆ koeI AMq nhIˆ, pr iek pqI dI hoey ibnwˆ auh iks dI vhutI kr ky bulweI jwey?

lines.gurmukhi: bg syq gwq jIv Gwq kir Kwq kyqy; mon ghy pÎwnw Dry jugq n pweIAY [

Unknown.translation: The looks of a heron are like that of a swan but it kills many living beings to eat them up. He silently sits in contemplation but such contemplation cannot reach one to the Lord.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: icty srIr vwlw bglw ikMny jIv Gwq kr ky Kw jwˆdw hY, mon BI Dwrdw hY qy iDAwn BI lw lYˆdw hY, pr pRIqm ivc juVn dI jugq pRwpq nhIˆ krdw[

lines.gurmukhi: fwNf kI fMfweI burvweI n kihq AwvY; Aiq hI iFTweI sukucq n ljweIAY [

Unknown.translation: The shameless words and foul acts of a Bhand (low caste persons who entertain people on their happy functions) are beyond description. Due to their extreme impudence, they never feel shy of saying and doing anything.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: BMf dw BMfpuxw qy inrl`jqw khI nhIˆ jw skdI, aus dw FIT puxw BI Aiq huMdw hY iksy g`ly sMkoc nhIˆ krdw qy nw hI SrimMdw huMdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy pr qn Dn dUKnw iqRdyK mm; piqq Anyk eyk rom n pujweIAY [641[

Unknown.translation: Similarly, like the incurable and deadly disease, I am infested with the ailments of looking at other's woman, other's wealth and slander. Sins of every hair of my body are more intense than the myriad sins of many sinners.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqvyˆ prwey qn, prwey Dn qy prweI inMidAw Awid dy qRY doK myry ivc hn, myry iek vwl dy brwbr Anykwˆ pwpI nhIˆ phuMc skdy ]641]
